name: Cheeky Little Devils
description:
My submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Play as three mischievous devil siblings as they traverse the terrain of Heaven's prison, jumping through portals and playing harps on their quest to escape. Use the character's unique abilities to help eachother and find your way out of the prison in this pastel puzzler.

ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

SPACE TO CHANGE CHARACTER

R TO RESTART LEVEL

Thank you for playing!
